5.14. cpforager.diagnostic.plot_folium_traj

cpforager.diagnostic.plot_folium_traj(df, params, traj_id, nest_position)

Plot folium map of the trajectory.

Parameters:

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe with longitude, latitude.

  • params (dict) – parameters dictionary.

  • traj_id (str) – trajectory id.

  • nest_position (list([float, float])) – nest position.

Returns:

the folium map.

Return type:

folium.Map

Note

The required fields in the parameters dictionary are colony.
